name: Lo-Fi Lounge
description: This game was made with the intent to create a chill peaceful like environment to hang out in with others. Engage in TV and radio entertainment with others around the world while listening to live lo-fi synced between players. Unlike other social VR platforms, In Lo-fi Lounge, you can enter the world after a simple 30 second character setup scene. This, with smart matchmaking adds to the simplicity and ease of setting up your account and meeting new people. Remember to be respectful and kind to others on the community, we are all passionate about VR and share something in common.
